keys.string: [None]Wow I never noticed how much grey hair you have.
Life’s hard man. Half of these are from PL and the other half from genetics.
[None]Man you’re old, look at that grey.
Yeah and I’m still here. You will be old by the time you finish too.
Maybe I’ll be like Dr. Amini and will be able to pull it off as I get older.
You recall Dr. Amini’s great hair with his touch of grey. Jace pulls a box from under his bed.
There is no way he doesn’t use a little of thissss.
Jace holds up a box labeled Touch Of Grey.
No,I found it. Why do you need it?
Yeah I sure as hell don’t need it. I have enough as it.
Please tell me you are going to give that to Dr. Amini. That would be amazing! You better tell me all about it.
Jace stares deeply into your eyes.
You better tell me about it.

ArrayOfString.string: [Narrator][Option]You see Jace Sitting on his bed in his room… His room is pretty bright, you notice he has a lot of grey hair.
[None]Wow I never noticed how much grey hair you have.
[None]Man you’re old, look at that grey.
[Jace][Dialog]Life’s hard man. Half of these are from PL and the other half from genetics.
[Jace][Dialog]Maybe I’ll be like Dr. Amini and will be able to pull it off as I get older.
[Jace][Dialog]Yeah and I’m still here. You will be old by the time you finish too.
[Jace][Dialog]Maybe I’ll be like Dr. Amini and will be able to pull it off as I get older.
[Narrator][Dialog]You recall Dr. Amini’s great hair with his touch of grey. Jace pulls a box from under his bed.
[Jace][Dialog]There is no way he doesn’t use a little of thissss.
[Narrator][Dialog]Jace holds up a box labeled Touch Of Grey.
[Player][Option]
[None]Do you use it?
[None]Can I have it?
[Jace][Dialog]No,I found it. Why do you need it?
[Player][Dialog]Sure I’ll take it.
[Jace][Dialog]Please tell me you are going to give that to Dr. Amini. That would be amazing! You better tell me all about it.
[Jace][Dialog]Yeah I sure as hell don’t need it. I have enough as it.
[Jace][Dialog]Please tell me you are going to give that to Dr. Amini. That would be amazing! You better tell me all about it.
[Narrator][Dialog]Jace stares deeply into your eyes.
[Jace][Dialog]You better tell me about it.
[Jace][Scene]PuzzleTest
